mapper.select: select aaa.* , (select count(*) as total_count FROM COMMENTS C where c.COMMENTS_PARENT = aaa.BOARD_NUM AND COMMENTS_DEL_GB = 'N' ) AS TOTAL_COMMENTS from ( SELECT row_number() over (order by board_date desc) rnum, B.BOARD_NUM, B.BOARD_CAT, B.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEM_NICK, B.BOARD_DATE, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.BOARD_WRITER FROM MEMBER M, BOARD B WHERE M.MEM_NUM = B.BOARD_WRITER AND B.BOARD_DEL_GB='N' AND MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} )aaa where aaa.rnum between 0 and 10 ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
